mapper.select: select * from sys_office where (id=#{parentId} or parent_id=#{parentId} or parent_ids like #{likeParentIds}) and del_flag='0'
select o.* from sys_office o INNER JOIN sys_role_office ro on ro.office_id=o.id and o.del_flag ='0' and ro.role_id=#{roleId}
select o.* from sys_office o INNER JOIN sys_user_office uo on o.id=uo.user_id inner join sys_user u on uo.user_id=u.id and o.del_flag ='0' and u.id=#{uid}
select t.* from sys_office t where t.del_flag='0' order by t.code
mapper.sql: id, parent_id, parent_ids, area_id, code, name, type, grade, address, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_office
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_office (parent_id, parent_ids, area_id, code, name, type, grade, address, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag) values ( #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{master,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
